name: Vectorsonic Combi
descr:
Interferential and combined 1 and 3 MHz ultrasound unit. The interferential module offers 10 preset sweep modes and one operator controlled frequency mode wait a sweep up to 150 Hz wide, anywhere within 0 - 300 Hz. The ultrasound module has a 5 sg/cm. 1 and 3 MHz head and there is an optional .75 sq/cm. 1 and 3 MHz head. Interferential can be given in bipolar mode though the 1 MHz ultrasould head.

Specifications: 37x12x25 cm.
